Body.Content:
We are announcing support for the newest version of Adaptive Cards in Copilot Studio. This functionality will reach general availability on October 31, 2025.

How does this affect me?
With support for the latest version of Adaptive Cards, makers in Copilot Studio will have access to new features such as carousels, charts, and advanced layouts. These enhancements enable the creation of rich, in-context experiences within agents. The new capabilities will be supported in both Teams and Microsoft 365 channels.

What action do I need to take?
This message is for awareness and no action is required.
